document_data.name: Altar of the Air
document_data.mainbody: The '''Altar of the Air''' was a shrine to the goddess [[Akadi]] built over a crypt in the center of the ruins of the city of [[Dashadjen]].<ref name=EotSS-p79>
document_data.Inhabitants: The mummified priestess of Akadi, [[El Sadhara]], resided there.<ref name=EotSS-p79/>
document_data.Defenses: Some unknown power protected the shrine from the destructive power of the sands of the [[Calim Desert]], and the Altar and its tombs below were said to contain treasures and magic unimaginable.<ref name=EotSS-p79/>
document_data.History: The structure was built by lesser [[djinn]] during the time of [[Coramshan]] to honor the djinni [[Calim]], and much of its elemental treasures awaited his supposed return.<ref name=LEoF-p118>
